=== 0.6 (ongoing) ===

=== 0.5 ===

- Added user__email to search fields for UserMediaImage admin.

=== 0.4 ===

- Added admin for the UserMediaImage model.

=== 0.3 ===

- Added UpdateView

=== 0.2 ===

- Added UserMediaImageFormMixin which allows us to upload an image as part of
  any model's ModelForm.

=== 0.1 ===

- Initial commit
